title: Introducing Carroted Blog
author: alexsour
description: The Carroted Blog is a place where news and updates about Carroted or Carroted projects will be posted.
content:
Since its creation, there has been no source for Carroted news. While certain announcements were posted in some projects' Discord servers, there was no one source for all Carroted news.

Introducing Carroted Blog, a place where news and updates about Carroted or Carroted projects will be posted.

There is no fixed schedule of when posts will be written and/or published, but anytime, one of our members can post a new article!

I really hope you enjoy the blog!
